This policy is the general privacy policy terms that our platforms are uniformly applicable, which is suitable for all products and services provided by our platform.

If we use the products or services provided by Himalayan in the affiliated company's products or services but have not set up independent privacy policies, this part of this product or service is also applicable to this policy.

If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the various contact information provided by us.
